sentence.Network_en: U.S. Marines had a firefight with local gunmen this morning.
sentence.Network_cn: 今晨美国海军陆战队士兵同当地持枪歹徒发生了交火。

sentence.Network_en: 'I'll never smoke again!'' Yeah? Go tell that to the marines.'
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我再也不抽烟了! ” “ 是 吗 ?骗鬼去吧. ”

sentence.Network_en: Their uniforms distinguish soldiers, sailors and marines from each other.
sentence.Network_cn: 从他们的军服可分清他们是陆军士兵 、 水兵和海军陆战队战士.

PerfectNetExp.abs: important : hives need to be able to be healed easily by gorges , and knifed by marines , so they will generally need to hang near the ground .重要提示：荨麻疹需要能够愈合轻松三峡，和持刀的海军陆战队员，所以他们通常会需要坑接近地面。
This organization killed hundreds of American marines in 1983 ., 这个组织在 1983年杀死了数百名美国海军陆战队士兵.

a massive firefight in the middle results in the Zerg being chased off , with the Terrans losing lots of marines but only one of the expensive nighthawks in the process .这么一场在中间的大规模交火让虫族大部队被赶走，同时人族损失了大量的机枪兵以及一架夜鹰。
if the marines do not get their new helicopter base , he has warned , Okinawa will not wave goodbye to the 8,000 marines bound for Guam .他警告称，如果美国海军陆战队不能得到新的直升机基地，冲绳将无法“送走”本应调往关岛的8000名海军陆战队官兵。

entry.def: A marine is a  member of an armed force, for example the US Marine Corps or the Royal Marines, who is specially trained for military duties at sea as well as on land.
Marine is used to describe things relating to the sea or to the animals and plants that live in the sea.
Marine is used to describe things relating to ships and their movement at sea.
